Name: Dimi-tini
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Like Dimi - this drink's easy to like.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Dimitri Lezinska, London, England.
